nodes.documentation:
@title Tournament - The Matryx tournament.
 @author Max Howard - <max@nanome.ai>, Sam Hessenauer - <sam@nanome.ai>
nodes.name: MatryxTournament

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows rounds to invoke SubmissionCreated events on this tournament.
 @param _submissionAddress Address of the submission.
nodes.name: invokeSubmissionCreatedEvent

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires the function caller to be the platform.
nodes.name: onlyPlatform

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires the function caller to be an entrant.
nodes.name: onlyEntrant

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires the function caller to be the platform or the owner of this tournament
nodes.name: platformOrOwner
isEntrant

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the state of the tournament. One of:
 NotYetOpen, Open, Closed, Abandoned
nodes.name: getState

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer) view returns (uint256,address)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the current round number.
 @return _currentRound Number of the current round.
nodes.name: currentRound

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns this tournament's bounty.
nodes.name: getBounty
getGhostRound

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns all of the sender's submissions to this tournament.
 @return (_roundIndices[], _submissionIndices[]) Locations of the sender's submissions.
nodes.name: mySubmissions

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of submissions made to this tournament.
 @return _submissionCount Number of submissions made to this tournament.
nodes.name: submissionCount

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibConstruction.TournamentData storage pointer,struct LibConstruction.TournamentModificationData memory,string memory,address)
function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer,address,address,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,struct LibConstruction.RoundData memory,uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@param _submissionAddresses The winning submission addresses
 @param _rewardDistribution Distribution indicating how to split the reward among the submissions
nodes.name: selectWinners

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer,struct LibConstruction.RoundData memory,address)

nodes.documentation: @dev Allocates some of this tournament's balance to the current round
nodes.name: allocateMoreToRound

nodes.documentation: @dev This function should be called after the user selects winners for their tournament and chooses the "DoNothing" option
nodes.name: jumpToNextRound

nodes.documentation: @dev This function closes the tournament after the tournament owner selects their winners with the "DoNothing" option
nodes.name: stopTournament

nodes.documentation:
@dev Creates a new round.
 @return The new round's address.
nodes.name: createRound

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer,address,address,address,struct LibConstruction.RoundData memory,bool) returns (address)

function (struct LibConstruction.TournamentData storage pointer,struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer,struct LibTournamentStateManagement.EntryData storage pointer,address) returns (bool)

nodes.name: enterUserInTournament

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the fee in MTX to be payed by a prospective entrant.
 @return Entry fee for this tournament.
nodes.name: getEntryFee

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer,struct LibTournamentStateManagement.EntryData storage pointer,address)

function (struct LibTournamentStateManagement.StateData storage pointer,struct LibTournamentStateManagement.EntryData storage pointer,address,address[] memory,uint128[] memory,address[] memory,struct LibConstruction.SubmissionData memory) returns (address)
